Title: Umbraco: Inspired DataTypes
Description: New datatypes that are not in the default install to make Umbraco have some new controls such as Content/Media Treeview, Content/Media Drop Down List with Treeview. Controls have options to restrict DocumentTypes or MediaType and the start location to retreive from
HomeWiki:
Project Description
New datatypes that are not in the default install to make Umbraco have some new controls  such as

Content/Media Treeview, Content/Media Drop Down List with Treeview. Controls have options to restrict DocumentTypes or MediaType and the start location to retreive from

Treeview Controls

Content Treeview: allowing multiple content to be added to the data type and also has the options for start location and only allowing certain DocumentTypes.

Media Treeview: allowing multiple media to be added to the data type and also has the options for start location and only allowing certain MediaTypes.

Drop Down List Controls

Content Drop Down List Treeview: allowing single content to be added to the data type and also has the options for start location and only allowing certain DocumentTypes.

Media Drop Down List Treeview: allowing single media to be added to the data type and also has the options for start location and only allowing certain MediaTypes.

Example usage of the Content Treeview and the Media Drop Down list Treeview

Release 0.91 changes:

  • Added Location by named path.
  • Added show child nodes in treeview flag
